title: [Large-Scale] Mastery Course for Critical Utilization of Online Library Information

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and fundamental smartphone operation proficiency
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate employees requiring enhanced competencies in scientific research material search and evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate credible scientific information sources in online library systems based on at least three criteria
Learners can select materials aligned with research objectives with over 80% accuracy by comparatively analyzing information search results
Learners can write reports critically analyzing bias and reliability of academic resources

resources: Science subject sample dataset from information sources
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
